    • Package main.java.text_editor.editors

      • Class main.java.text_editor.editors.Editor

        class Editor extends Object implements Serializable

        • Serialized Fields

          • caretPosition
            int caretPosition
            The current caret position within the text
          • text
            StringBuilder text
            The text content of the editor stored as a StringBuilder for efficient manipulation

      • Class main.java.text_editor.editors.SpellCheckEditor

        class SpellCheckEditor extends Editor implements Serializable

        • Serialized Fields

          • dictionary
            ArrayList<String> dictionary
            List of words used for spell checking
          • predictor
            WordPredictor predictor
            Word predictor used for suggesting words as the user types

      • Class main.java.text_editor.editors.TranslateEditor

        class TranslateEditor extends Editor implements Serializable

        • Serialized Fields

          • translationMap
            LinkedHashMap<String,String> translationMap
            Map maintaining the translation between source words and their target language equivalents
